s: Flipboku is an independent flip book publishing house based on the island of Mallorca (Spain), specializing in interactive and traditional flip books. Our aim is to play and reinvent within the limits of the thumb-powered pocket cinema, creating unique and mind-blowing flip books for all ages.

Our flip books published in collaboration with contemporary artists and animators, as well as flipbooks with early footage from the classics of film and pre-cinema like Eadweard Muybridge and Étienne-Jules Marey, Charlie Chaplin, Méliès y Fritz Lang.

Our flip books stand out because of their interactive nature. We turn them into animated coloring books or puzzle flip books, providing a creative and engaging experience for the user. Our editions can also include Augmented Reality and QR codes to expand the potential of the format on smartphones ...

t: Flipboku | Flip Book Shop, Custom Flip Books
s: Discover outstanding interactive flip books, artists flip books and flip books from other publishers like Seigensha and Napa Books. Our editions incorporate enhanced content through Augmented Reality and QR codes to further expand the potential of the format on smartphones or tablets.
Flipboku's entire flipbook collection as well as books from international artists and publishers, such as Napa Books and Seigensha Art Publishing.
